text: Ganapati Ram is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India from the Machhlishahr, Uttar Pradesh as a member of the Indian National Congress. ==References== ==External links== *Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:1926 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Lok Sabha members from Uttar Pradesh Category:1st Lok Sabha members Category:2nd Lok Sabha members Category:3rd Lok Sabha members Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: Ganapati Ram
